Name: Paladin-BlockDamageReduction
Description: When a damage is blocked, multiply the damage taken with Value0, and increase Divine Protection by Value2

Name: Paladin-PerfectBlockDamageReduction
Description: When a damage is Perfect blocked, multiply the damage taken with Value0, and increase Divine Protection by Value2

Name: Paladin-DivineReductionLossPer5Sec
Description: Reduce Divine Protection by Value every 5 sec
